ygData.subject: quest of two tokens
ygData.msgSnippet: The quest where you give the token of bravery and the token of generosity to the fellow behind the hall of truth has made me pause.  The NPC says that you can
ygData.messageBody:
The quest where you give the token of bravery and the token of generosity to
the fellow behind the hall of truth has made me pause. The NPC says that you
can only take the test of truth once and tarantulas should be EASY for you
first. Has anyone completed this successfully? If so, what level should I be
to do it? Is it useful to bring a spell caster to help out with it?

The other thing I heard is that this quest really ticks off the freeport
militia to the point where you become Kill on Sight. Every paladin operating
near freeport should know that there are fake walls out past the gate that can
be used to get into the catacombs and sewers and thus get to the bank and guild
without too much trouble. The one for north freeport is on the north side wall
outside the gate in west commons. it is the wall that runs east west.

Dan Kassiday
kassiday@...
http://www.clark.net/pub/kassiday
